title: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and
context: [ยง658H-12] Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act. This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, 15 United States Code section 7001 et seq.; provided that this chapter shall not modify, limit, or supersede section 101&copy; of that Act or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that Act. [L 2013, c 284, pt of ยง1]
